definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker

sentences.english: I do have 3 bikes with handle bar brakes that she can use.
sentences.chinese: 我有三輛車子是帶手閘的，下次她可以用這種車子。

sentences.english: The car, whose handbrake wasn't very reliable, began to slide backwards.
sentences.chinese: 這輛車已開始向後滑動，因爲手閘不太靈。
